mapper.select: select * from pet where user_id = #{userId} order by to_number(pat_id)
mapper.insert: insert into pet(pat_id, user_id, animal_cd, pat_name, pat_weight, pat_birth) values(#{patId}, #{userId}, #{animalCd}, #{patName}, #{patWeight}, #{patBirth})
insert into hospital(hos_nm, pat_id, cli_cd, cli_name, cli_addr1, cli_addr2, cli_tel) values(HOS_SEQ.Nextval, #{patId}, #{cliCd}, #{cliName}, #{cliAddr1}, #{cliAddr2}, #{cliTel})
mapper.select: select a.*, B.Cli_Cd, B.Cli_Name, B.Hos_Nm, B.Cli_Addr1, B.Cli_Addr2, B.Cli_Tel, B.Hos_Nm from pet a, Hospital b where A.Pat_Id = B.Pat_Id and A.User_Id = #{userId}

SELECT PRA_CD, CLI_CD, EMP_ID, PAT_ID, PRA_DEPT, to_char(PRA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as pra_date2, PRA_STATUS, PRA_CON, PRA_WEIGHT, SUR_CHECK, STAY_CHECK, PRE_OUT_CHECK, PRE_IN_TOTAL, TEST_TOTAL, PRA_PRICE, VACCINE_PRICE, REC_NM FROM PRA WHERE PAT_ID = #{patId} ORDER BY PRA_DATE ASC

select a.PAT_ID, a.VACCINE_NAME, to_char(a.VACCINE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS vaccine_date, a.VACCINE_COUNT, a.vd_nm, b.cli_cd, b.cli_name, b.cli_addr1, b.cli_addr2, b.cli_tel, b.hos_nm from vaccine a, hospital b where a.pat_id = b.pat_id and a.pat_id = #{patId}
select a.*, b.cli_cd, b.cli_name, b.cli_addr1, b.cli_addr2, b.cli_tel, b.hos_nm from stay a, hospital b where a.pat_id = b.pat_id and a.pat_id = #{patId}

select a.SN_NM, a.ST_CD, to_char(a.SN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as sn_date, a.SN_SPECAL, a.ST_PRICE, a.SN_CON, a.SN_HEALTH_STATE, a.SN_TEMP_STATE, a.SN_POO_STATE, b.st_food_total, C.food_price, D.food_name from stay_note a, stay b, food_detail c, food d where a.st_cd = b.st_cd and A.st_cd = C.st_cd and D.food_nm = C.food_nm and a.st_cd = #{stCd} and to_char(a.sn_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(c.food_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by a.sn_date

select DISTINCT b.*, to_char((select vaccine_date from vaccine where pat_id = #{patId} and vd_nm = #{vdNm}) + b.VD_DAY) as next_day from vaccine_detail b where b.VD_NAME = (select vd_name from vaccine_detail where vd_nm = #{vdNm}) and b.vd_nm >= #{vdNm}
select a.pat_name, b.mem_tel,a.pat_gender, a.pat_birth, a.pat_memo from patient a join member b on a.mem_id = b.mem_id where a.pat_id = #{pat_id}
select count(*) from appreceipt where pat_id = #{patId} and wonmu_check = 'N'
select * from EMPLOYEES where ANIMAL_CD = #{animalCd} and emp_job = '의사' and emp_state = '재직중'
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (RES_NM, EMP_ID, PAT_ID, RES_START_DATE, RES_ALLDAY, RES_TITLE, RES_COLOR) values (RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empId}, #{patId}, to_date(#{resStartDate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:MI:SS'), '0', '진료', '#a4c6f1')
mapper.select: select * from reservation where pat_id = #{patId} and res_start_date > (select sysdate from dual)
select b.rec_nm, a.pra_cd, a.PRA_WEIGHT, a.PRA_date from pra a join (select rec_nm from receipt where pat_id = #{patId} )b on b.rec_nm = a.rec_nm order by b.rec_nm asc
